mapper.select: select p.url as url, GROUP_CONCAT(r.name) as roles from sys_role_permission rp left join sys_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id left join sys_role r on rp.role_id = r.id where p.url is not null and p.url != '' and r.id is not null group by p.url

select p.* from sys_permission p left join sys_role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id left join sys_user_role ur on rp.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_user u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.id = #{param}
select p.* from sys_permission p where p.parent_id = #{parentId}
